original_title: Amerikas Kriege - Korea Vietnam Irak Afghanistan Spiegel
overview: No country in the world fights as many battles as the USA. Since the Second World War there has not been a single decade without a war. In Korea, Vietnam, Iraq or Afghanistan, the superpower fought for democracy, human rights and, of course, always for its own interests: against communism, for oil or for power. After the Cold, America's mighty military machine was able to intervene worldwide.
title: America's Wars - Korea Vietnam Iraq Afghanistan Mirror
